content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my München apartment, let me emphasize its prime location in the city center and modern features. However, considering my intention to maximize the return on investment, I propose starting negotiations at 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the average rent in the city center, I propose 1300 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my minimum accepted rental price is higher due to the apartment's sought-after location and recent construction.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I take your point about the location and newness of the apartment. How about 1400 Euro per month? That's a reasonable midpoint between our proposals.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1400 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
